trans-unit.source: BizTalk XML Validate connector helps your app validate XML data against predefined XML schemas.
trans-unit.target: BizTalk XML Validate connector helps your app validate XML data against predefined XML schemas.

trans-unit.source: Users can use either existing schemas or generate schemas based out of a flat file instance, JSON instance or existing connectors.
trans-unit.target: Users can use either existing schemas or generate schemas based out of a flat file instance, JSON instance or existing connectors.

trans-unit.source: To use the BizTalk XML Validator, you need to first create an instance of the BizTalk XML Validator API app.
trans-unit.target: To use the BizTalk XML Validator, you need to first create an instance of the BizTalk XML Validator API app.

trans-unit.source: This can be done either inline while creating a logic app or by selecting the BizTalk XML Validator API app from the Azure Marketplace.
trans-unit.target: This can be done either inline while creating a logic app or by selecting the BizTalk XML Validator API app from the Azure Marketplace.

trans-unit.source: BizTalk XML Validator takes schemas as part of its configuration.
trans-unit.target: BizTalk XML Validator takes schemas as part of its configuration.

trans-unit.source: User can launch the API App configuration blade by either launching the API App directly from the Azure portal, or through by double clicking the API App on the designer surface.
trans-unit.target: User can launch the API App configuration blade by either launching the API App directly from the Azure portal, or through by double clicking the API App on the designer surface.

trans-unit.source: In the API App blade, user can configure schemas by clicking on *Schemas* part
trans-unit.target: In the API App blade, user can configure schemas by clicking on *Schemas* part

trans-unit.source: Users can upload schemas from disk or generate one from a flat file instance or a JSON instance.
trans-unit.target: Users can upload schemas from disk or generate one from a flat file instance or a JSON instance.

trans-unit.source: Using the BizTalk Flat File Encoder in design surface
trans-unit.target: Using the BizTalk Flat File Encoder in design surface

trans-unit.source: Once configured, users can click on *->* and choose from an action from a list of actions.
trans-unit.target: Once configured, users can click on *->* and choose from an action from a list of actions.

trans-unit.source: Validate Xml action Validates a given xml input against pre-configured schemas.
trans-unit.target: Validate Xml action Validates a given xml input against pre-configured schemas.

trans-unit.source: The action returns the output as an object.
trans-unit.target: The action returns the output as an object.

trans-unit.source: Output contains the model representing response of Xml Validator.
trans-unit.target: Output contains the model representing response of Xml Validator.

trans-unit.source: It consists of result, schema name, root node and error description.
trans-unit.target: It consists of result, schema name, root node and error description.
